law.text: The provisions of KRS 531.100 shall not apply to the transference of prohibited images by a telephone company, a cable television company or any of its affiliates, an Internet provider, or a commercial on-line service provider, or to the carrying, broadcasting, or performing of related activities in providing telephone, cable television, Internet, or commercial on-line services.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2002.
